title: Is there support for OSX 10.7.5?
body:
A patch or two ago my League client stopped working. This was actually after a spout of working after not working with similar symptoms.

My normal 9 GB install always crashes. I tried installing a fresh copy. It downloads data. Then the LoLPatcher process always crashes.

This is the exception type

Exception Type:  EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV)
Exception Codes: KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS at 0x00007fff5fc01028

What changed in these recent patches? Will I ever get to play League again? Is there officially support for OSX 10.7.5? Could this bug be related to the removal of old OS support?

replies.body: Hmmmmm it sounds like you may need to update that OS if at all possible. Our [**Mac Minimum Specs page**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654#section-mac) lists at least OSX 10.8.5 or higher.
